text: The official program starts on Monday, 24.02.2025 at 9 am and ends on Friday, 28.02.2025 at 11:45 am. The timetable can be downloaded here. Participation throughout the entire symposium is encouraged. Sponsored by Deutsche Telekom Stiftung
title: Timetable

text: We are delighted to share that the proceedings of the AIDEA Symposium have now been published! This collection brings together the diverse and inspiring contributions presented at the event, reflecting the latest developments and insights in the field. We are excited for you to explore the work of our community and hope it will serve as a valuable resource for your research and practice. You can find the individual papers on OpenReview. Alternatively, you can download a ZIP file with all contributions from our website: Download proceedings as ZIP file
title: Proceedings

text: We are delighted to share that the proceedings of the AIDEA Symposium have now been published! text: The symposium takes place at the KTH Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm, Sweden. Further information on the venue will follow soon.
title: Location
